vulnerabilities.title: JSZip contains Path Traversal via loadAsync
vulnerabilities.description: loadAsync in JSZip before 3.8.0 allows Directory Traversal via a crafted ZIP archive.

vulnerabilities.title: jszip Vulnerable to Prototype Pollution
vulnerabilities.description: This affects the package jszip before 3.7.0. Crafting a new zip file with filenames set to Object prototype values (e.g `__proto__`, `toString`, etc) results in a returned object with a modified prototype instance.
